sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import Header from './components/Header.jsx'; import Footer from './components/Footer.jsx'; function App() { const [activeSection, setActiveSection] = useState('hero'); const handleNavClick = (section) => { setActiveSection(section); const element = document.getElementById(section); if (element) { element.scrollIntoView({ behavior: 'smooth' }); } }; const handleWorkClick = () => { setActiveSection('portfolio'); const element = document.getElementById('portfolio'); if (element) { element.scrollIntoView({ behavior: 'smooth' }); } }; // Handle scroll to update active section useEffect(() => { const handleScroll = () => { const sections = ['hero', 'resume', 'about', 'portfolio', 'contact']; const scrollPosition = window.scrollY + 100; for (const section of sections) { const element = document.getElementById(section); if (element) { const offsetTop = element.offsetTop; const offsetHeight = element.offsetHeight; if (scrollPosition >= offsetTop && scrollPosition < offsetTop + offsetHeight) { setActiveSection(section); break; } } } }; window.addEventListener('scroll', handleScroll); return () => window.removeEventListener('scroll', handleScroll); }, []); return (
{/* Hero Section */}

Hello, my name is

Saqlain

I welcome you to see

{ if (e.key === 'Enter' || e.key === ' ') { e.preventDefault(); handleWorkClick(); } }} > my work

{/* Resume Section */}

Resume

Professional Experience

Full Stack Developer

Tech Company (2022-Present)

Developed and maintained web applications using modern technologies including React.js, Node.js, and various databases.

Skills

Frontend

  • • React.js
  • • JavaScript
  • • HTML5 & CSS3
  • • Tailwind CSS

Backend

  • • Node.js
  • • Python
  • • Express.js

Database

  • • MongoDB
  • • PostgreSQL
  • • MySQL

Education

Computer Science Degree

University Name (2018-2022)

{/* About Section */}

About Me

Hello! I'm Saqlain Sheikh, a passionate full-stack developer with a love for creating beautiful, functional, and user-friendly applications.

I specialize in modern web technologies and enjoy working on challenging projects that push the boundaries of what's possible on the web. My experience spans across frontend and backend development, with a focus on React.js ecosystem.

When I'm not coding, you can find me exploring new technologies, contributing to open-source projects, or enjoying outdoor activities.

What I Do:

Web Application Development

Building modern, responsive web applications

UI/UX Design Implementation

Creating beautiful and intuitive user interfaces

API Development & Integration

Building robust APIs and integrating third-party services

Performance Optimization

Optimizing applications for speed and efficiency

{/* Portfolio Section */}

My Work

Here are some of my recent projects and accomplishments:

E-Commerce Platform

Full-stack e-commerce solution built with React.js and Node.js

React Node.js MongoDB Stripe API

Task Management App

Collaborative project management tool with real-time updates

React Socket.io Express.js PostgreSQL

Portfolio Website

This very website you're looking at right now!

React Tailwind CSS Design System

More projects coming soon...

{/* Contact Section */}

Contact Me

I'd love to hear from you! Let's connect and discuss opportunities.

Email

saqlain@example.com

Phone

+1 (555) 123-4567

Location

City, State, Country

Social Media

Feel free to reach out through any of the social media platforms linked in the footer as well!

); } export default App;
